ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Lavastorm bug
ygData.msgSnippet: the only zoning issues i ve had is the bug where you die while zoning. running out of the new paw i have died only to find myself zone and at the safe spot,
ygData.messageBody:
the only zoning issues i've had is the bug where you die while zoning.
running out of the new paw i have died only to find myself zone and at the
safe spot, somewhere near the bard in South Karana. strangely though, i did
not have full health. i have yet to figure out how i had the number of hit
points i did. i had somewhere around 80 hp, then i cast my shield spell on
myself and only went up to like 87hp, even though it normally adds a lot
more than 7hp. so maybe something to do with dying and it taking into
account i had negative hp or something weird. only John Kim really knows =)

Shada
